citations.narrative:
The facility had 2 separate incidents where predators were able to enter the animal enclosures. On July 18, 2023, a wild
rat snake was found in the bat enclosure along with a dead half-eaten bat. X-rays showed the snake had eaten a bat. The
enclosure is mesh with 1 inch openings that the snake was able to enter the enclosure through. On July 8, 2023, a wild
alligator was found in the cheetah exhibit. The 3 cheetahs were shifted into holding while the alligator was removed and
were not injured. There is an area of the enclosure that the alligator is believed to have climbed onto and then fell or
jumped into the enclosure.
Failure to protect animals in enclosures from predators can result in injury or death to the animals.
Housing facilities must be constructed and maintained to protect the animals from injury, including from predators that
access the enclosure.
Correct by: Temporary corrective actions have been taken for the bat enclosure. More permanent corrective actions by:
February 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
The facility had 2 separate incidents where predators were able to enter the animal enclosures. On July 18, 2023, a wild 
rat snake was found in the bat enclosure along with a dead half-eaten bat. X-rays showed the snake had eaten a bat. The 
enclosure is mesh with 1 inch openings that the snake was able to enter the enclosure through. On July 8, 2023, a wild 
alligator was found in the cheetah exhibit. The 3 cheetahs were shifted into holding while the alligator was removed and 
were not injured. There is an area of the enclosure that the alligator is believed to have climbed onto and then fell or 
jumped into the enclosure. 
Failure to protect animals in enclosures from predators can result in injury or death to the animals. 
Housing facilities must be constructed and maintained to protect the animals from injury, including from predators that 
access the enclosure. 
Correct by: Temporary corrective actions have been taken for the bat enclosure. More permanent corrective actions by: 
February 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
